thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Serenity Harbour

author: Serenity Harbour
title: Serenity Harbour
text: We've been using this site since August 2016. Every house sit we've had we've met like minded people and had great experiences. We recommended it to our parents who used the site to find sitters for their dog whilst on a 5 week trip and have become firm friends with the sitters too. An amazing way to make sure fur family is cared for whilst you're away. I can't recommend it for traveling animal lovers and pet owners alike!
